In England, in the seven days to 17 September, there were 145,910 new confirmed cases (258.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 September, there were 174,950 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (29,040 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 September is 6,425,056 (11,361.7 cases per 100,000 population).
